title: New: King Krule – The Noose of Jah City
body:
You may remember **Zoo Kid**, a South-East London based artist, who last year blew the blogosphere out of the water with his debut release/video ‘Out Getting Ribs’.

It seems that the New Year has brought with it a new name, with the young singer/songwriter now going under the name of King Krule. Despite the new name, the music essentially flows in a similar way, lending from Elvis Costello and perhaps more recently Jamie T, his new track blends a London ladish swagger with tender and youthful insecurities and frustrations.

King Krule’s new EP drops through [True Panther](http://www.truepanther.com/) on November 7.

Stream the EP’s closing track below.
